blogPost.excerpt:
Small but MIGHTY! Casey Bishop completely blows the judges away with her powerful rendition of Motley Crue’s “Live Wire” for her American Idol audition. Luke Bryan makes a bold statement, claiming he believes Casey may just be the next winner of American Idol! Will Luke’s prediction be too much pressure for Casey to handle going into Hollywood Week?

See more of American Idol 2021 on our official site: http://www.americanidol.com
Like American Idol on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AmericanIdol
Follow American Idol on Twitter: https://twitter.com/americanidol
Follow American Idol on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/americanidol/

AMERICAN IDOL, the iconic series that revolutionized the television landscape by pioneering the music competition genre, returns on ABC.

American Idol 2021

Helping to determine who America will ultimately vote for to become the next singing sensation are music industry forces and superstar judges Luke Bryan, Katy Perry and Lionel Richie. Emmy® Award-winning host and producer Ryan Seacrest continues as host of the beloved series, while multimedia personality Bobby Bones serves as the in-house mentor.
blogPost.body:
Small but MIGHTY! Casey Bishop completely blows the judges away with her powerful rendition of Motley Crue’s “Live Wire” for her American Idol audition. Luke Bryan makes a bold statement, claiming he believes Casey may just be the next winner of American Idol! Will Luke’s prediction be too much pressure for Casey to handle going into Hollywood Week?

See more of American Idol 2021 on our official site: http://www.americanidol.com
Like American Idol on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AmericanIdol
Follow American Idol on Twitter: https://twitter.com/americanidol
Follow American Idol on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/americanidol/

AMERICAN IDOL, the iconic series that revolutionized the television landscape by pioneering the music competition genre, returns on ABC.

American Idol 2021

Helping to determine who America will ultimately vote for to become the next singing sensation are music industry forces and superstar judges Luke Bryan, Katy Perry and Lionel Richie. Emmy® Award-winning host and producer Ryan Seacrest continues as host of the beloved series, while multimedia personality Bobby Bones serves as the in-house mentor.
blogPost.title: Amazing! Luke Bryan Calls 15-Year-Old Casey Bishop A Massive Star! - American Idol 2021
blogPost.author: American Idol

localize.title: 惊人！卢克-布莱恩称15岁的凯西-毕晓普为大明星! - 美国偶像2021
localize.description:
小而有力 凯西-毕晓普（Casey Bishop）在《美国偶像》的试镜中，用她那充满力量的演唱Motley Crue的 "Live Wire "彻底震撼了评委。卢克-布莱恩发表了一个大胆的声明，声称他相信凯西可能就是下一个美国偶像的冠军！卢克的预测会不会太准确？卢克的预测对于凯西来说，进入好莱坞周会不会压力太大？

更多《美国偶像2021》精彩内容请看官网：http://www.americanidol.com。
在Facebook上喜欢美国偶像：https://www.facebook.com/AmericanIdol
在Twitter上关注《美国偶像》：https://twitter.com/americanidol
在Instagram上关注美国偶像：https://www.instagram.com/americanidol/

美国偶像》（AMERICAN IDOL），这个通过开创音乐竞赛类型而彻底改变电视格局的标志性系列，将在ABC电视台回归。

美国偶像2021

帮助决定美国人最终将投票选出谁成为下一个歌唱明星的是音乐界的力量和超级明星评委卢克-布莱恩、凯蒂-佩里和莱昂内尔-里奇。艾美奖得主、主持人兼制作人Ryan Seacrest继续担任该系列节目的主持人，而多媒体名人Bobby Bones则担任内部导师。

localize.title: 驚人！盧克-布萊恩稱15歲的凱西-畢曉普爲大明星! - 美國偶像2021
localize.description:
小而有力 凱西-畢曉普（Casey Bishop）在《美國偶像》的試鏡中，用她那充滿力量的演唱Motley Crue的 "Live Wire "徹底震撼了評委。盧克-布萊恩發表了一個大膽的聲明，聲稱他相信凱西可能就是下一個美國偶像的冠軍！盧克的預測會不會太準確？盧克的預測對於凱西來說，進入好萊塢週會不會壓力太大？

更多《美國偶像2021》精彩內容請看官網：http://www.americanidol.com。
在Facebook上喜歡美國偶像：https://www.facebook.com/AmericanIdol
在Twitter上關注《美國偶像》：https://twitter.com/americanidol
在Instagram上關注美國偶像：https://www.instagram.com/americanidol/

美國偶像》（AMERICAN IDOL），這個通過開創音樂競賽類型而徹底改變電視格局的標誌性系列，將在ABC電視臺迴歸。

美國偶像2021

幫助決定美國人最終將投票選出誰成爲下一個歌唱明星的是音樂界的力量和超級明星評委盧克-布萊恩、凱蒂-佩裏和萊昂內爾-裏奇。艾美獎得主、主持人兼製作人Ryan Seacrest繼續擔任該系列節目的主持人，而多媒體名人Bobby Bones則擔任內部導師。
